    schema = dataset{[Name="sandbox_s1_integrated_database_platform",Kind="Schema"]}[Data],
    data = schema{[Name="s1_wellsite_data",Kind="View"]}[Data],
    #"Trimmed Text" = Table.TransformColumns(data,{{"wellsite_name", Text.Trim, type text}}),

    #"Added Custom" = Table.AddColumn(#"Replaced Value", "Order", each if [platform_type] = "Platform"
then "02-" & [wellsite_name]
else if [platform_type] = "Reserved area"
     then "01-" & [wellsite_name]
     else "00-" & [wellsite_name], type text)
in
    #"Added Custom"","ReferencedQueriesFormulaText":{}}

queries.name: S1_area_component
text: Source = Table.FromRows(Json.Document(Binary.Decompress(Binary.FromText("", BinaryEncoding.Base64), Compression.Deflate)), let _t = ((type nullable text) meta [Serialized.Text = true]) in type table [wellsite_name = _t, icon = _t, platform_type = _t, block = _t]),

queries.name: S1_area_w_land_type
text: Source = Table.NestedJoin(S1_area_component, {"wellsite_name"}, #"Land Type", {"Land Type"}, "Land Type", JoinKind.FullOuter),
#"Expanded Land Type" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(Source, "Land Type", {"Land Type"}, {"Land Type.1"}),
#"Replaced Value" = Table.ReplaceValue(#"Filled Up",null,"ไม่มีการระบุข้อมูล",Replacer.ReplaceValue,{"Land Type.1"}),

queries.name: S1_Reserved_Area
text: #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Promoted Headers",{{"No.", Int64.Type}, {"Name", type text}, {"Point", Int64.Type}, {"X", type number}, {"Y", type number}, {"Latitude", type text}, {"Longtitude", type text}}),

#"Pivoted Column" = Table.Pivot(Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Removed Columns", {{"Point", type text}}, "en-US"), List.Distinct(Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Removed Columns", {{"Point", type text}}, "en-US")[Point]), "Point", "Polygon"),
#"Added Custom1" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed Other Columns", "icon", each "MULTIPOLYGON( ( ( " & [Polygon] & " ) ) )", type text),
#"Added Custom2" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed Columns1", "platform_type", each "Reserved area", type text),

queries.name: S1_Reserved_Area_w_land_type
text: Source = Table.NestedJoin(S1_Reserved_Area, {"platform_type"}, #"Land Type Temp", {"platform_type"}, "Land Type", JoinKind.FullOuter),

queries.name: wellsite_boundary
text: #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Sorted Rows",{{"longitude", type text}, {"latitude", type text}}),

#"Pivoted Column" = Table.Pivot(Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Merged Columns", {{"point", type text}}, "en-US"), List.Distinct(Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Merged Columns", {{"point", type text}}, "en-US")[point]), "point", "Polygon"),
#"Added Custom" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed Columns2", "icon", each "POLYGON (( " & [Polygon] & " ))", type text),
#"Added Custom1" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed Columns1", "platform_type", each "area", type text)

queries.name: wellsite_location
text: #"Grouped Rows" = Table.Group(#"Sorted Rows", {"wellsite_name", "block"}, {{"latitude", each List.Average([latitude]), type nullable number}, {"longitude", each List.Average([longitude]), type nullable number}}),

text: #"Filtered Rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Sorted Rows", let latest = List.Max(#"Sorted Rows"[prod_date]) in each [prod_date] = latest)
